entry.title: questions about bitcoin-XT code fork & non-consensus hard-fork
entry.summary: The email thread discusses the concerns raised by Adam regarding personal ownership of the proposed fork in Bitcoin-XT. The email writer, Faiz Khan, hopes that whoever wishes to fork the protocol should reconsider whether they are truly ready to test their skills and resources. He believes it is non-trivial to hard-fork successfully and it is counterproductive for a single developer to manage the process start-to-finish. Bryan Bishop encourages everyone to evaluate both messages and source code more carefully, especially in the world of bitcoin, as technical miscommunication can be catastrophic in this context. The discussion does not provide any information about who is actually planning to move to Bitcoin-XT if this happens, except Gavin and Mike.
